TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewHeaderBorderStyle extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the border style that can be applied to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties of a control.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example illustrates the use of this type. For more information, see [How to: Change the Border and Gridline Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](../Topic/How%20to:%20Change%20the%20Border%20and%20Gridline%20Styles%20in%20the%20Windows%20Forms%20DataGridView%20Control.md).
